content.text:
4.3.5.5 K_AES_128 or K_AES_256 (M) 
At least one of the following tables (Table 47 and Table 48) SHALL be supported. 
Table 47 contains Optional rows designated with (O). 
*K1 means that a field is indirectly writable using the GenKey method. 
Table 47 - Locking SP - K_AES_128 Table Preconfiguration 
Table 48 - Locking SP - K_AES_256 Table Preconfiguration 
TCG Storage Security Subsystem Class (SSC): Opal 
TCG Storage Security Subsystem Class (SSC): Opal  |  Version 2.30  |  1/30/2025  |  PUBLISHED 
Page 89 
Â© TCG 2025

tables.title: Table 47 - Locking SP - K_AES_128 Table Preconfiguration
tables.table_md:
| UID | Name | CommonName | Key | Mode | |:---|:---|:---|:---|:---| | 00 00 08 05 00 00 00 01 | "K_AES_128_GlobalRange_Key" | | VU
\*K1 | VU | | 00 00 08 05 00 03 00 01 | "K_AES_128_Range1_Key" | | VU
\*K1 | VU | | 00 00 08 05 00 03 NN NN
(O) | "K_AES_128_RangeNNNN_Key" | | VU
\*K1 | VU |

tables.title: Table 48 - Locking SP - K_AES_256 Table Preconfiguration
tables.table_md:
| UID | Name | CommonName | Key | Mode | |---|---|---|---|---| | 00 00 08 0600 00 00 01 | "K_AES_256_GlobalRange_Key" | | VU
*K1 | VU | | 00 00 08 06
00 03 00 01 | "K_AES_256_Range1_Key" | | VU
*K1 | VU | | 00 00 08 06
00 03 NN NN
(O) | "K_AES_256_RangeNNNN_Key" | | VU
*K1 | VU |
